info.name: DCE Backend Developer Assesment
info.description: This is a collection of requests to complete the assesment by DCE

request.description: This API endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all customers in the system .
This API endpoint allows you to delete a customer by his id
This API endpoint allows you to update a customer by his id . You have to also provide a Cutomer Update Request object in body
This API endpoint allows you to create a customer . You have to also provide a Cutomer Registration Request object in body

item.name: Get All Active Orders By Customers

request.description: This API endpoint allows you to get all the orders which are currently active by a customer .
